synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Hexacoordinated ZnII metal centers are chelated to two carboxylate groups of two ndc subunits and the other two coordination sites on the ZnII center are occupied by an o-phen unit.

materials.name: AN@1’ (1 a), NMA@1’ (1 b), DMA@1’ (1 c), and DMPT@1’ (1 d) inclusion compounds

synthesis_conditions.yield: 0.81, 0.99, 0.98, and 0.61 molecules of AN, NMA, DMA, and DMPT, respectively, were encapsulated
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Postsynthetic guest-encapsulated compounds showed strong color differences and characteristic turn-on emission.

materials.name: Toluene, nitrobenzene, cyanobenzene, and iodobenzene encapsulated frameworks

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: These molecules all have a higher ionization potential compared to AN and thus have weaker electron-donating capabilities. Despite this, similar molecular arrangement to that of 1 b’–1 d’.
